```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tidytuesdayR)
```

```{r}
penguins <- tt_load('2020-07-28')
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(penguins$penguins)
```

```{r}
penguins$penguins %>%
    ggplot(aes(y = year, x = island, color = species))+
    geom_jitter()
```
